What features would you like to see in a: As a software engineer, I value efficiency and automation, so I would appreciate features that help me manage my finances easily and quickly. For example, automatic categorization of transactions and personalized spending insights would be helpful. I would also like to be able to set and track my financial goals within the app, as well as create custom budgets for different categories of expenses. Mobile check deposit and easy expense splitting with friends and family would also be convenient features.

How often do you use mobile banking serv: As a busy professional, I use mobile banking services frequently. I would say I use them at least once a day to check my account balances, monitor transactions, and transfer funds.

What would make you switch to a differen: I would switch to a different digital banking service if it offered better features, more convenience, and better user experience. For example, if a different service had more robust budgeting and goal-setting tools or offered better insights into my spending habits, I would consider switching. Additionally, if a different service had a more intuitive and user-friendly interface, I would be more likely to use it. Finally, if a different service offered better interest rates or lower fees, that would also be a strong incentive to switch.

How important is it for you to have freq: As an independent and busy person, I value the convenience and flexibility of mobile banking, and I appreciate being able to interact with my credit union through their mobile app. However, I don't necessarily need frequent engagement with the credit union as long as the app is reliable, easy to use, and provides me with the information and tools I need to manage my finances effectively. So, while frequent engagement is not a top priority for me, I do value having access to my credit union's services and support through their mobile app when I need it.

What concerns do you have about using a: As someone who values financial stability, I would be concerned about the security and reliability of a new digital banking service. I would want to make sure that my personal and financial information is protected and that the app is secure against hacking and fraud. Additionally, I would want to make sure that the app is reliable and that I can access my account and perform transactions without any issues or glitches. Finally, I would want to make sure that the customer support is responsive and helpful in case I encounter any problems or have any questions about the service.

Based on what I have heard about the service, I would rate my likelihood of signing up for it as an 8 out of 10.
